data.name: Old Engine with Scripts
data.rules:
The timer starts on d1_trainstation_01 after the G-Man speech. Developer 1 is not allowed.

Using SPT and AHK are allowed. The only permitted SPT commands are y_spt_autojump 1, y_spt_pause 1 (but pauses must be timed), +y_spt_duckspam, and _y_spt_force_fov90 1. Commands such as "ensure legit" must remain on. 

The "wait" and "reload" commands, and the wait table, are both allowed. 

RInput is allowed.

Using the "New Game" in place of save deleting is not allowed, and runs that utilize this will be rejected.
